content: ❗️ free tutorial for size s + the best price & more always on my website https //loopsonly com/products/luna-swing-dress the luna swing dress crochet pattern is all about easygoing style and comfort with a relaxed fit playful swing silhouette and big functional pockets this dress is perfect for layering or wearing solo it s worked in two simple panels with sleeves and pockets **materials** **…yarn** drops loves you 7 8/4 classic cotton yarn group a sport weight color 23 plum 750 800 950 1050 1200 1300 g / 2550 2720 3230 3570 4080 4420 m **…other** hook 4 mm hook yarn needle scissors measuring tape stitch markers **gauge** 18 sts x 9 5 row = 10 x 10 cm in linked double_crochet 16 5 sts x 8 5 row = 10 x 10 cm in double_crochet **finished measurements in centimeters ** shoulder to shoulder 56 60 67 71 76 80 bust circumference 111 120 133 142 151 160 length 73 75 82 84 89 91 upper arm 20 21 22 24 25 26 **specialty stitch & technique key** linked double_crochet **stitch key us terminology ** chain = chain ldc = linked double_crochet single_crochet = single_crochet slip_stitch = slip_stitch st = stitch sts = stitches yo = yarn over **notes** you will start by making two panels front and back and sew the shoulders together next you will crochet the sleeves and attach them to the panels then you will create the pockets directly onto the panels finally sew the sides of the body and sleeves together and finish with one round of single_crochet around the neck hole chain 2 doesn t count as a stitch watch my youtube video tutorial for any uncertainties
